summary: CONSUMER STARTED  VEHICLE EARLY IN THE MORNING AND  HEARD A LOUD  NOISE. AFTER FIFTEEN  MINUTES  WHEN  VEHICLE WARMED UP  THERE WAS  NO NOISE. DEALER STATED  THAT THIS TYPE  OF  NOISE  WAS COMMON TO ANY VEHICLE BEING  STARTED  EARLY IN THE MORNING.*AK    2001 GMC YUKON XL DENALI EXPERIENCES KNOCKING DURING COLD START UP OF THE ENGINE.  THE KNOCKING LAST FOR ABOUT 15 MINUTES UNTIL ENGINE IS WARMED UP.*MR
